Any info about statgain patterns for monster breeds?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance Archive (GameBoy Advance): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Any info about statgain patterns for monster breeds?
By Jennimason0990 on Thursday, October 17, 2013 - 04:39 pm:

I've been thinking of picking this game up again, does anyone know of any info regarding the statgains of different breeds? This seems to be the only one of the older MR games where this information isn't listed here, and searching has failed me as well.

I'm not sure how I would go about getting the info from the game itself, either, unfortunately. Though if anyone has any insights into this I would appreciate it, I have no idea what (legal, forum-appropriate!) ways exist to try and get this information.

I somewhat doubt they changed much from MRA to MRA2 so it's probably close enough to use the MRA2 numbers, but I would like to see if anyone has a lead on more concrete info about this one.
